N = int(input())
X = list(map(int, input().split()))

print(sum([(x - sum(X) / N)**2 for x in X]))

N = int(input())
X = list(map(int, input().split()))

# メソッド１
# 全体の平均値を求めて、そこに会議をすると最小値が出る
print(sum([(x - (sum(X) / N)) ** 2 for x in X]))

# メソッド２
# 全体の平均値を求めて、そこに会議をすると最小値が出る
# なぜかこの方法の方が速い
print(sum([(x - (sum(X) / N)) ** 2 for x in X]))

# メソッド３
# ソートした際に、真ん中に会議をすると最小値が出る
# sortしないとTLE
X.sort()
print(sum([(x - X[N // 2]) ** 2 for x in X]))

def main():
    n = int(input())
    x = list(map(int, input().split()))
    x.sort()
    mid = x[int(n/2)]
    print(sum([abs(i-mid) for i in x]))


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys

def main():
    n = int(sys.stdin.readline().rstrip())
    x = [int(i) for i in sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split()]
    x.sort()
    median = x[n // 2]
    res = 0
    for i in x:
        res += (i - median) ** 2
    print(res)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

N = int(input())
X = list(map(int, input().split()))

X_min = min(X)
X_max = max(X)

X_range = X_max - X_min

if X_range % 2 == 0:
    X_range -= 1

X_center = X_min + (X_range // 2)

total_stamina = 0
for x in X:
    total_stamina += (x - X_center)**2

print(total_stamina)

def main():
    n = int(input())
    x = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    # x_i - x_j = x_i - x_k + x_k - x_j
    x.sort()
    x_i = x[n//2]
    # x_i is the median of x
    print(sum([abs(x_i - x_j) for x_j in x]))

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

import sys

N = int(sys.stdin.readline())
X = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().split()]

X.sort()

P = X[N // 2]

min_total_stamina = 0
for i in range(N):
    min_total_stamina += abs(X[i] - P)

print(min_total_stamina)
